SAINT.Name: St. Nicephorus the Confessor, Patriarch of Constantinople (+828)
Great Martyr John the New of Sochi, who suffered at Belgrade (+ 1330-1340)
Uncovering of the relics (1819) of Righteous Juliana, princess of Vyazemsk, Novotorzhskoy
Kievo-Bratsk Icon of the Mother of God (1654)
Hieromartyr Pothinus, bishop of Lyon and with him martyr Blandin and others (+177)
